message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you my product for $9500. It's a great deal for you, considering its worth to you is $10000. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate it, but I think we can work out a better deal. Considering the value of the product to me, I would like to propose a price of $9000.

Bob, I understand your position, but $9000 is still a bit low for me. I'm willing to come down a bit more to $9250. This is a fair price considering the value of the product to you. Let's close this deal!
